mapper.select: select p.*, m.name 'supplierName', c.name 'categoryName', w.name 'warehouseName', u.name 'unitName', pw.inventory, pw.min_inventory, pw.max_inventory from t_product p left join t_merchant m on m.id = p.supplier_id left join t_category c on c.id = p.category_id left join t_warehouse w on w.id = p.preferred_warehouse_id left join t_unit u on u.id = p.unit_id left join t_product_warehouse pw on pw.product_id = p.id where p.deleted_ind = 0

select p.*, pw.inventory, pw.min_inventory, pw.max_inventory from t_product_warehouse pw left join t_product p on pw.product_id = p.id where (pw.`inventory` >= pw.`max_inventory` and pw.`max_inventory` >= 0) || (pw.inventory <= pw.`min_inventory` and pw.`min_inventory` >= 0)
